TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DownloadFileGroupCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: 描述最近完成的檔案下載。

span.span: Describes a file download that has recently completed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例下載的檔案群組名為`HelpFiles`，並顯示下載中狀態列的進度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 這個範例需要您部署的 Windows Form 應用程式，而且您的主要表單具有控制項和控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Group As String
public: property System::String ^ Group { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得正在下載的檔案群組名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.
A representing the name of the file group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以起始多次呼叫並同時下載多個檔案群組。You can initiate multiple calls to and download multiple file groups simultaneously. 使用回呼對應至這些群組來判斷哪些事件。Use to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例下載的檔案群組名為`HelpFiles`，並顯示下載中狀態列的進度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 這個範例需要您部署的 Windows Form 應用程式，而且您的主要表單具有控制項和控制項，名為`downloadStatus`。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#8)]
